website_summaries.verdict: Inexpensive sound bar that focuses on improving mid-range frequencies and above.
pros: If you're looking to improve the quality of dialogue for TV shows and movies on your flat screen TV at home, this model does so at a good price point
Will work with most Bluetooth compatible mobile devices
Lightweight equipment that's easy to set up and use
cons: Has some issues with lags in the sound

customer_reviews.title: Something is funny with the bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this for alittle over a year. The sound is pretty good. My family and I watch movies on this almost every night. Only problem is it seems like the Bluetooth is constantly scanning. Because of this, now and again the sound drops out and suddenly comes back. We live in a neighborhood and I swear it must be other Bluetooth devices in the area messing with it. Seems like a poor radio engineering design flaw for such a high end brand. You guys overall could do better. Especially for the price range.
customer_reviews.author: GSF Tech

customer_reviews.title: Best 2.1 sound bar under $1,500
customer_reviews.text: This unit is an older unit, but if it's still available below $300, it's a steal. Take a look at Klipsch's website, only the top rated unit has this much power. Prior CNET reviews, when this unit was selling for MSRP $599 said it's the best sound bar under $1,500. Without a doubt the best sound system I've ever owned. Crispy highs and thumping bass from the 8" woofer. It doesn't have fancy HDMI connection, but it does have an optical cable included.....if you've bought a HDTV/LCD/OLED fancy flat screen....it's got an optical cable receptacle. Best purchase ever. Improves life quality.
customer_reviews.author: T. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Worst remote ever. Your friends will make fun of you for it.
customer_reviews.text: The remote to this unit makes me angry every day. I sit 9 feet away on a couch, facing directly at the receiver. I hit the button over and over from different angles. I clean the LED and try again. It works after 30 to 60 seconds. How do you make a remote this bad? Was it never tested at all?
customer_reviews.author: Aret Carlsen

customer_reviews.title: Quality Sound For A Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered today and installed in minutes. The sound is excellent for the money and the subwoofer delivers. Pairing the remote to my X1 (Xfinity/Comcast) remote was a little bit of work/googling. Picture attached for instructions on how to do that. Klipsch instructions are horrible. Bluetooth connection to my iPhone 7+ is a little sketchy, but the workaround is to just stream my music through the TV first via AppleTV. Quality sound for a low price! Great deal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Moody

customer_reviews.title: For the price, there is no better.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is superb. The sub is a bit on the weak side but I also like a lot of bass, although the sub produces incredibly clean bass. I do also love the fact that I can program my sony tv remote to mute or turn the sound bar up or down. I was actually very surprised to hear all kinds of little noises and ambiance in movies and games that I could never hear with tv speakers. All in all I definitely recommend this sound bar for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Fake review? Definitely not.

customer_reviews.title: So bummed about this purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Bummed out. This is a big price tag for me. I was so excited to get his after reading the reviews. Problem is, this thing is almost impossible to turn up and down. When you do adjust the volume it is a massive adjustment so I find I can either have it MUCH TOO LOUD or simply so low that I cannot hear it. I have not been able to link it with my TV remote and have to adjust the volume with the teeny tiny remote (hope I don't ever lose that) AND I have to walk across to stand within 2-3 feet of the sound bar for the remote to work. Really a bummer of a purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but lacks new technology
customer_reviews.text: I replaced Yamaha soundbar with this model. Sound is amazing and bass is thrilling. you can't complain about the sound, it gives premium sound theatre experience at below $300 price. But it lacks new standards like HDMI support, and very cheap remote. You should wallmount the sound bar else remote wont work if you just place it on the tv stand because the controls are placed the other side. I use Apple TV and I cannot control volume using Apple tv remote. I will definitely return this one and try out Polk command sound bar.
customer_reviews.author: Sivasagar P.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Sound Performance is good. Wish it could pump out a bit more bass. I have the woofer turned all the way up and positioned the box in a corner to improve bass response but was hoping it would be better. Klispch is known for big bass but in my opinion this product could use more. Works perfectly with my DirecTV/TV remote (for volume). Auto on and off work great. Every once in a while it will auto start up in BT mode instead of TV input which requires u to find the mini remote and change it. Not the end of the world but why it does this is a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Wiseone

customer_reviews.title: Good Product - an excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Missing a few features such as auto turn on/off but for the price it is more than adequate. Subwoofer has great sound, easy set=up, easy to use remote control that can be programmed. I researched several sound bars and found this one to be the best buy for the amount of money I was willing to spend. I am not the least bit sorry as this is a great buy !!
customer_reviews.author: Grandpa S

customer_reviews.title: Great Product - Superior Support
customer_reviews.text: I received this product with a defective AC Adapter. Utilizing a back up, the soundbar system was hooked up and sounds outstanding! OneStop saw a previous review and called me immediately about the adapter. In my discussion, Larry stated they would have a new adapter sent to me in a couple of days. Great support from this company and greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: WII player60

customer_reviews.title: Great sound bar
customer_reviews.text: Great sound bar. This is the 1st sound bar I've owned so I can't compare it to other brands but what I can say is this has very good sound. Bass is plenty deep enough and will thump if you want it too as it is adjustable. I went from a full surround system mainly to tidy up the place and am more than pleased with this system. Bluetooth is a major plus and is simple to connect. Good looking equipment as well. After a week of use I don't miss my surround system at all as this system is more than capable of filling the room.
customer_reviews.author: dgf David

customer_reviews.title: Flawed connection issue
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the unit and used digital output to connect to my LG tv. However as others have mentioned after a few minutes the connection goes to Bluetooth to search for Bluetooth enabled devices. Quite annoying. I paired the unit to my LG Bluetooth and the connection is better until you pick up any device that looks for Bluetooth connection option and it start to search. When you do not pair it with any devices it goes back to the sound source for the previously paired device. So far I am not ready to return the unit yet because it is quite bulky and I want to try it with other projector before I make the decision.
customer_reviews.author: Young kang

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer broken out of box
customer_reviews.text: I've bought Klipsch several times in the past and have always been satisfied. This time was a different story. The subwoofer did not work out of the box. I figured I'd just warranty it through Klipsch, trusting they would have great customer service. Turns out I had to pay $80 dollars non refundable out of my pocket for shipping on something they sold me broken out of the box. I will never buy Klipsch again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob M

customer_reviews.title: Decent for the price. For almost $300 though, ...
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price. For almost $300 though, the cheap flimsy remote is an absolute joke. I'm content with my purchase, but plan to upgrade again shortly. Packaging came open and damaged, wasn't impressed with that.
customer_reviews.author: RC28

customer_reviews.title: Loud and Bass
customer_reviews.text: This soundbar is still the best I've had, I've bought a couple at this point. It gets loud, the bass is really really low (I've tested it down to 26hz), and the mids and highs are flat enough with a slight focus on vocals because that's good for movies. Don't get me wrong this soundbar is incredible for music, but movies is where it really shines!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Sounded good while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Sound was great, for almost 2 years then Some random thumps from the sub, and no sound from the bar. Happened a couple of time and was fixed from a restart. And now..... No sound.....
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality is great, but the 3D audio should come on automatically.
customer_reviews.text: I love this sound bar/sub. It has fantastic audio quality, but the remove is crappy. I've had to repair it twice already because the backing on the front sticker plate is metallic and gets stuck on the + button. Then anytime you press any of the buttons, the sound goes straight to max volume. Also, it would be nice if I didn't have to press the 3D audio button every time I turn it on. It should come on automatically for a better audio experience.
customer_reviews.author: Cole

customer_reviews.title: Wireless subwoofer is not the best solution.
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this product 5 stars but there seems to be a bug in the device or setup. The wireless center speaker needs to be powered down regularly to remove a nagging flutter sound. The overall sound is amazing for the price point. I’ll be contacting Klipsch to see what can be done or I’ll be dumping this and finding another solution.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Babcock

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound/easy setup.
customer_reviews.text: I returned the one I ordered because someone else ordered exact same for me as Christmas gift. My brother in law has this model and recommend it. It’s truly awesome. Great sound, easy set up. Only downfall is you have to use the remote that it comes with and can’t pair your remote to operate it. Or st least we can’t. But it’s worth that even. Sounds amazing.
customer_reviews.author: NEDO

customer_reviews.title: inadequate sound reproduction - From a Klipsch fan
customer_reviews.text: I own a number of high end Klipsch speakers highlighted by a pair of RF-7's and consider myself a Klipsch fan but this sound bar is subpar. I'm not sure if I received a bad egg or the rave reviewers have never experienced what good speakers sound like. If you have a small budget I suggest you look for a couple of powered bookshelf 3-way speakers as they will sound way better than these.
customer_reviews.author: Tried & True

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, works great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, works great. Turns on when TV turns on. Shuts itself off when inactive. I programmed my apple tv series 4 remote to control the volume. Tiny nitpick. When on it has a fairly bright green light in the front. Red is for when it is off. I personally prefer AV components for home theaters to have low key lighting when in use.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best soundbar in the industry, I've test a few other brands but no justice to this. Sound is so clear and base is strong enough to break your windows glass. Powerful and well made product, easy to setup and connections are simple that even a 5 yr old can set it up. It's been about six months that I have it mounted on my wall. Love it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Elkin Diosa

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Sounds great, easy to install and set up, the sub woofer paired automatically and quickly with the sound bar. My only criticisms are: there is no display on the sound bar or remote to show how loud it is; there's no EQ of any kind, only a volume knob on the subwoofer; and, most importantly, you can't disable blue tooth. Even when the sound bar is powered down, it will power up and try to pair with any blue tooth whether your want it to or not.
customer_reviews.author: CDM

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, set up a pain.
customer_reviews.text: Klipsch products are always great quality and the sound is exceptional. The set up was a pain although connecting it was simple. It had a several second delay in the sound from the picture and the instructions did not give any way to fix it. Finally had to call company tech support and was directed on how to do a factory reset which completely fixed the problem. Seems like this is probably something that has happened before.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, Easy to setup, fits any room.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy setup, the soundbar comes with its own Optical cable which is rather small, but in a good way. While the length is short (roughly 3 feet) its thin enough that it can bend without any problem, something my other cable could NOT do. The bar itself has great sound quality, and the sub that comes with it delivers good quality as well. If you find this on sale, I would recommend it. Some people mention the Bluetooth as being always on, which it is, but you can connect a device you don't normally use to it, and then you don't have to worry about anyone else attaching to it. Or just live far enough away from neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Best darn soundbar I've heard
customer_reviews.text: Best darn soundbar I've heard. Awesome. Voices are great. Bass kicks butt, really carries. Oh those horns, just love them. A must have for anyone who wants great sound with their tv.
customer_reviews.author: tony

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I really love these speakers... when they are working properly. With use of both the bluetooth feature and the optic cable the sound will cut in and out. There will also be random static. I'm so disappointed about this. The sound quality of the speakers are great and they get very loud. I really want to love them but nothing is more frustrating than your sound cutting in and out. With how much this cost I am very disappointed by this. They are too big for me to even want to deal with the hassle of returning them. I will deal with it until I can afford to buy something else again.
customer_reviews.author: Audiflyby

customer_reviews.title: Average sound quality, below average performance
customer_reviews.text: It has an auto on feature which is great if you're not a gamer. The bar turns itself on randomly while I'm gaming. (I have a turtle Beach headset for sound). As far as sound quality, I have a $200 JBL that sounds better and produces higher quality sound when playing loud music. Plus the JBL has options for changing audio levels. The Klipsch only has an option on the subwoofer Min-Max and honestly the subwoofer is the most depressing part of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Klipsch system and the Sonos system for comparison. All I have to say is that the Sonos sound is not worth 7 times the price of this Klipsch system. This Klipsch sounds amazing for what it is. Very clear highs and the bass is nice and strong. Very satisfying experience.
customer_reviews.author: ABRAHAM D YANG

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: I own this klipsch r10b and I love it. After 7 years it finally stopped and was so happy to find another...Yes it has the bluetooth flaw but what product is perfect? Trust me when I say after hearing this you will do nothing but smile...I also wanted to include Deluxe Deals in this review (the seller). These days you have to be careful with who you deal with, (scammers and liars) and Deluxe Deals is far from that... The product I received IS brand new and WOW was the shipping really fast.. Thank you for living up to your policy of being honest and REALLY fast shipping... Very HAPPY customer...THANK YOU
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This system sounds amazing. I love that you can teach it to ...
customer_reviews.text: This system sounds amazing. I love that you can teach it to use your own remote to control volume and mute. Bluetooth works fine. Sure it could use more features, but in the most important category, sound quality, this is easily th he best system I have ever had. Almost no loss of quality even at high volume. Love it. Update: A year later still going strong. A pleasure to listen too. Update: 2 years later... still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Exceeds all expectations
customer_reviews.text: After 10 home theatre systems in 22 years, hearing dialogue has finally happened. Clear distinct dialogue on cable and blu ray. Even actors with accents! Base and midrange perfect. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Perry White

customer_reviews.title: So much from so little!!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a full 5.1ch Polk Audio speaker system run on a Harman Kardon AVR-1600 with this soundbar - sub combo in the name of decluttering my master bedroom. Wish I did it sooner! This minimalist sound system will blow you away both with how crystal clear the sound is and how unexpectedly loud and powerful it can be when you crank it up. The vast majority of my listening through this system is at nominal volumes in the evenings while winding down from the day or watching TV/Netflix/Amazon Video in bed... however, I have cranked it up on music a number of times and it fills every inch of my 2700sqft home with sound from the master bedroom!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Palko

customer_reviews.title: Sorry I bought this.
customer_reviews.text: I used this sound bar in my living room and it worked great for two years and the sound was fantastic. Then one day the sound started cutting in and out, and a few days later it wouldn’t work anymore. I tried plugging in using L/R instead of optical with no luck. Actually the lights on the front light up and it will show as connected via Bluetooth to my phone, but no sound. I know I got a couple of years use out of this sound bar, but for almost $400 initially it should last longer than that. I’m bummed, and won’t buy a Klipsch again.
customer_reviews.author: greg raymakers

customer_reviews.title: Took a while to get a good woofer balance with the bar but once the sweet ...
customer_reviews.text: The sound is incredible. Took a while to get a good woofer balance with the bar but once the sweet spot was found...sweetness. I can't give this 5 stars due to the horrible Bluetooth connectivity. I connect with my iPhone 7+ and cannot do anything with my phone while paired. Don't even think about taking a paired device outside a 10ft radius of the soundbar the music cuts out severely and almost completely.
customer_reviews.author: tommy bouland

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Well worth the price. After all, It is Klipsch. Sound quality ic excellent. Sound is so good that I had to buy another for a different entertainment area.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Tylee

customer_reviews.title: Kipsch does it again!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great sound bar. I had a Panasonic model before this and I was not impressed at all. When I connected this thing and powered it up I was floored by the sound coming from this unit. I had the sub turn up to 3/4 volume and had to turn it down to half. Kipsch is top of the line when it comes to speakers I own various products from them and am always impressed. I also tested the Bluetooth with my old lumia 635 and my new Lumia 950 and it had excellent range and clarity with both phones.
customer_reviews.author: CASCA

customer_reviews.title: Worth the $$
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big soundbar guy, I prefer amps and speakers, however we have had several $100-$150 walmart bars, not great, but better than TV speakers, This one however, is soooo much better, and worth the money, when you turn it up, it does not sound like shit. Sub does a good job too. But then it's made by Klipsch, so you get what you pay for!! The remote could be a little nicer, but it works.
customer_reviews.author: PATRICK MANN

customer_reviews.title: What a difference!
customer_reviews.text: Installation was a snap and man o man does this sound a TON better than my pathetic TV speakers. I didn't even realize just how bad they were until I got this gem going. I can't compare it relative to other soundbars as this is the only one I've tried, but I can say that this one works wonderfully and I can't see myself ever using the plain TV speakers again.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: The sound is great, but I do not like the remote pairing
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great, but I do not like the remote pairing. You can NOT pair your satellite provider remote, so you will have 2 remotes - one for volume and one for everything else. Back to multiple remotes. It also sounds good as a Bluetooth speaker, but it always a hassle to get the impute back to the TV function.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia W.

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, problem with audio loss.
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good and the voices are clear. Simple setup and the sub is strong. Beyond the Bluetooth range problem mentioned in other reviews though, be aware that there is a sound cutout with some frequency and the only reason I didn't rate lower and execute a return (besides the trouble of shipping) for this is I'm not sure what the source of the problem is. Other reviewers noted this problem though and I ignored the warnings. So be aware this can happen and does and may depend on your setup.
customer_reviews.author: meemeows

customer_reviews.title: but this product is awesome! I would highly recommend this to someone wants ...
customer_reviews.text: Normally I don't write reviews, but this product is awesome! I would highly recommend this to someone wants their television to come to alive. The only thing I would criticize is the blue tooth range. You have to stand right in front of the sound bar. Other than that, this sound bar is the best! Turn up.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter

customer_reviews.title: Subwoofer is staticky junk
customer_reviews.text: I bought and returned two other soundbars from Klipsch. They all had a static to the subwoofer. The last one i got worked great until the return timeframe expired. For a high end system this one is horrible. I hate that i got rid of the cheap vizio for this expensive top end piece of junk. I do not and will not recommend this product to anyone. The soundbar works but the subwoofer is crap.
customer_reviews.author: Rita Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: this is the best!! Sounds is great
customer_reviews.text: After a badd speaker purchase, this is the best!! Sounds is great, price is right!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Bigham

customer_reviews.title: Very Clean and Fills my 20x20 room like a champ
customer_reviews.text: This unit Rocks. Very Clean and Fills my 20x20 room like a champ. Also I love the Wireless Sub. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Tech 101

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This is an ok system....thought it would be better....all in all I’ve had it two years and it still works! Unlike Samsung....would buy again
customer_reviews.author: wkham

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound, ok technology.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Only compaints is the bluetooth has short range and 3D sound is nonexistent. However, overall sound quality is amazing. Sub bumps and sounds/feels clean. If you want pure clean loud sound, without todays technology of 3D sound or 4k passthrough, this is a good option.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Torralba

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. For those who complain it switches to blue tooth randomly, if you use the device connected with Bluetooth for sound it will automatically connect. Example: I connected it to my laptop for sound and whenever I use the laptop it will switch over to the Bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Nice system. This thing puts lower priced systems to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice system. This thing puts lower priced systems to shame. The sub box must weight 25lbs. My only problem is not turning it up so loud that it disturbs the neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: GEORGE WADDINGTON

customer_reviews.title: Superior Sound
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is excellent. It's exactly what you would expect from Klipsch. The only thing I don't love is the remote. It's the size of a match box. Something a little larger and more sturdy would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: MaroonHawk

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Sound Quality. I have used a 5.1 Channel Home Theater system for a long time and wanted to go to a system that gives great sound effects and also has less wires. Good for watching movies as well as listening to music.
customer_reviews.author: akshay prasad

customer_reviews.title: Best Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: Best sound bar - fine quality and worth to buy :)
customer_reviews.author: Min

customer_reviews.title: No HDMI
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this. No hdmi ports. The model is obsolete and should be sold only with this disclosure
customer_reviews.author: Thomas G. Tynan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our needs
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for our 20x15 bedroom because we had a hard time hearing what people were saying on TV with the built in speakers. This unit more than handles doing that but also with the added benefit of playing music via Bluetooth. I would most definitely recommend it to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Techna AV

customer_reviews.title: Klipsch delivers again!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality, easy to set up. Replaced a bulky Klipsch full theater set up for aesthetics and I don’t regret it for a second. Full bright sound, excellent bass from the sun. Better for music than I expected as well!
customer_reviews.author: soonergirl

customer_reviews.title: I really like this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I really like this purchase. I'm not used to it yet though for a quality review. The bass is amazing. I do like that.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Good sound Works great The sound is clear and crisp
customer_reviews.author: Jimbob1971

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Customer
customer_reviews.text: Enjoy the sound the ! But the remote is a joke and you can’t use a universal remote to replace it. Would have never recommended this sound bar and even though it has been discontinued, I understand the remote on the later units have not been improved. Why a company like Klipsh would let a poorly designed remote spoil what should have been a wonderful product is a mystery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with Klipsch R-10B
customer_reviews.text: The sound on the television was less than stellar. I imagine this is what led me and other purchasers to buy a soundbar. Reviews indicated this Klipsch model was very good at improving intelligibility of voices. They were right. I can understand most of what is being said on screen. A great improvement. Set up was a cinch. It found the bass speaker right off. I was worried about that, having had problems with other bluetooth devices. Music sounds great too.
customer_reviews.author: Rex Allen

customer_reviews.title: Update of review
customer_reviews.text: After a little over 2 years of use the soundbar developed problems. The base module began a thumping sound. I called to see about repair and was given a range of $150 - $275 for repairs and shipping was was estimated to be $154 for shipping to and from the repair shop. I can basically get a new sound bar for the price of repair and shipping, Great sound while it lasted but it definitely should have lasted more than two years
customer_reviews.author: Bruce G. Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome system. Works great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome system. Works great. I've never used an optical cord and tried to plug it in without taking the covers off. So if you get this remember to do that. Haha
customer_reviews.author: Alex C.

customer_reviews.title: Better Bluetooth and it would be a 5⭐
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound!!! If it had better Bluetooth range, it would be a 5⭐. Would still buy it if I had it to do all over again. Still looking for information on extending the Bluetooth on this device!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jewlene Walkington

customer_reviews.title: Superb sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound wireless sub easy to setup and it’s a klipsche which eats Bose all day long for a fraction of the cost
customer_reviews.author: Christopher chiras

customer_reviews.title: Good sound.  Bad customer service
customer_reviews.text: Like the sound (and I'm picky). My remote failed after 4 months. You can not call them. Problem ticket is 3 weeks old with no response. There are plenty of sound bars out there that are good with responsive service.
customer_reviews.author: steve martjn

customer_reviews.title: Great System
customer_reviews.text: I had a friend that had a similar system and recommended it to me. I was not disappointed. It was simple to hook up and since it was bluetooth, it significantly reduce the wire foot print. Still needs power wires though. It produces a great sound and is used for movies, and music alike. I would highly recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Cory Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great sound archaic interface
customer_reviews.text: The sound on this device is great, however you cannot sync with a universal remote for your tv and have to use the klipch remote which is tiny and easy to lose. Also anyone in range of your sound bar can link up to it via Bluetooth making this a difficult choice for those living in apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Susan McFarlane

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers, Worst remote of any product I have ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: OK here is the thing, the soundbar and sub-woofer are 5 stars. The remote, is one star = 3 stars total. I don't know what is wrong with these remotes, but I have gone through 3 of them so far. They all have failed. I have not even bothered getting a 4th one, as it is not worth me keeping throwing money at a bad solution. So I use the computer it is hooked up to to control the volume and now I can't use the 3D option as it only is on the remote.
customer_reviews.author: OldGuyGamer

customer_reviews.title: Killer sound
customer_reviews.text: This sound bar rules. Best bass out of any I've heard, great highs. Everything sounds perfect from the, movies, news, and music. Only downside is it is big.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Heath

customer_reviews.title: Ok soundbar but far from great
customer_reviews.text: Sounds good but sound goes up and down wildly. Wish it had some setting to adjust, bigger remote which is tiny and ability to adjust bass on remote can only adjust at subwoofer

customer_reviews.text: Very much plug and play. Easy to set up and sounds great for what I want it for.

customer_reviews.text: I can pretty much say that I am a fan of this soundbar and sub.... Easy setup and great sound.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over a year now and I can say with confidence that there is simply not a better soundbar system in this price point. It's crystal clear, accurate, impressive bass, loud, and the 3d feature is nice in certain movies.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker set up!
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds amazing and the set up was so easy. Bluetooth sub links up right away and sounds awesome, rattles our whole house!

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing sound quality. I'm not an audiophile but this is pretty amazing. The bass is really good. Overall super happy we got this!

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding system
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding system, Bass is not that great though, I prefer more low end, It is VERY clear and clean sounding though.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome sound. Clear dialogue and full bass. Couldn't ask for better sound from a sound bar. Bluetooth is a little weak. Love that it turns on and off automatically with the TV.

customer_reviews.title: Impressive sound and base
customer_reviews.text: This item is awesome. I had ~$100 Visio sound bars before and those failed to impress. This delivers powerful sound. Update: I’ve had this for 6 months now with no issue. I am actually probably going to buy another for my other TV. Great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin B.

customer_reviews.title: Sub hits great for 4 months. Then poops out
customer_reviews.text: Sub quit working after 4 months. Played at 50% at most. Expected more from Klipsch
customer_reviews.author: DJ Seberger

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for. Great Quality!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a Indiana guy. Klipsch, to me is one of the top two. Never have i been let down.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful sound. Clear high and mid range, lots of deep bass. Easy to set up. You'll love it.
customer_reviews.author: MDNY

customer_reviews.title: Great sound.
customer_reviews.text: Its in my bedroom but can entertain the whole house with no problem. Great sound.

customer_reviews.title: I installed the Klipsch R10B and it sounds absolutely fantastic! I paired it to my Directv remote easily ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Samsung soundbar to go with the new 65" Vizio and took it back. No improvement over TV speakers. I installed the Klipsch R10B and it sounds absolutely fantastic! I paired it to my Directv remote easily by following the enclosed instructions. Klipsch gets it right!
customer_reviews.author: j reed

customer_reviews.title: The best bang for your money, at least on par with Bose
customer_reviews.text: Best and solid sound for the value. If Bose is the standard, this one is at least on par with the similar system from Bose which is way more expensive. Very easy to set up as well. The subwoofer is just amazing, the low bass shake my walls. Klipsch is an amazing speaker company and not overpriced like Bose. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: The best sound bar for the money
customer_reviews.text: The best sound bar for the money. The best bass and the best voice of any soundbar that i owned and heard..

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: A lot of sound out a small sized subwoofer. Clean and crisp sound out of the bar. Cant beat it for the price, good for music as well!
customer_reviews.author: D11287657

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Little issue with Bluetooth connectivity but not a big problem. Very decent sound.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality great sound took off one star because first one arrived damaged
customer_reviews.author: David Martin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This little bar and bass box bring some our tv and movies to life! It is true what some people complain about: it comes back on after you turn it off if you leave your tv on. BUT, just turn the little switch off on the bar when you're don with it and you're good! Not a big deal to us at all compared to the blue tooth synching a few seconds after you turn it on. I can listen to Pandora from my mac to by turning on air play to my Apple TV (since Apple TV removed Pandora from it's app list). We can finally hear people talking on the tv more clearly now. Totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: DD Dyna

customer_reviews.title: Incredible sound!
customer_reviews.text: This has really enhanced our TV viewing. With movies it's like sitting in a theater. With sports games, it's like being in the broadcast booth. Even the news is a pleasure to watch. The sound is very clear! Worth every penny...you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great audio quality. Just wish you could hook more Bluetooth speakers or another sub up to it
customer_reviews.author: Rufio The Great

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality but the blue tooth connection is terrible
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality but the blue tooth connection is terrible. Can't even stand across the room without it cutting in and out.
customer_reviews.author: KW

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased once default audio settings on TV were overcome. At first only one side would produce sound but that was my TV's fault. Provided optical cable was a foot short for my layout. Setting up of soundbar was simple enough. Bluetooth worked great. No issues there.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: the only good news is that the other was at least an ...
customer_reviews.text: When I first went looking for a soundbar, this one was a bit pricey. I bought a cheaper one that broke...the only good news is that the other was at least an adequate place holder til I could afford this one. I've had this for about a month and I love everything about it! I especially love being able to hear dialogue -- even when there's music or action in the background. That also means I hear other "subtle" sounds I don't usually get to hear, from footsteps, to doors closing, to mechanical whirring sounds. With all this sound, the pictures are even more alive!
customer_reviews.author: Carl Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Beats out my old 5. 1 system! Sub ...
customer_reviews.text: Beats out my old 5.1 system! Sub woofer is wireless! up to 20" away! I connect HDMI from Nvidia Shield to TV then optical from TV to sound bar
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best soundbar for price.
customer_reviews.text: Incredible sound quality. More than enough bass with plenty to spare. Highs are crystal clear. Very minimal distortion and only at extreme volumes
customer_reviews.author: Labrador Man

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff!!!
customer_reviews.text: Setup with Samsung TV was a snap. We were amazed at the sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: a geek wannabe

customer_reviews.title: Actually surprised at how good it sounds
customer_reviews.text: Actually surprised at how good it sounds. I would not have paid $599 for it when it came out. For the price I paid, I'm very happy with it. For $249? Can't beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Jerryd

product_meta.title: Klipsch R-10B Bluetooth Soundbar with Wireless Subwoofer (Satin Black)
product_meta.description:
Klipsch R10B Sound Bar w/ Wireless Subwoofer


A soundbar should be more than just a larger and louder version of the diminutive TV speakers it is replacing. Another primary function should be to increase sonic details, especially in the midrange frequency area and above, in order to significantly improve dialogue clarity that is extremely lacking with most of today's flat panel TV's. The Klipsch Reference R 10B addresses this need with a proven technology consistently refined over Klipsch's legendary 68 years plus loudspeaker experience: horn loading.



250W Peak Power Output

Provides quality sound to drive your favorite movies, shows, games and music. You should do more than just hear them, you should feel them.



True 2 Way Soundbar

Two 0.75" horn loaded textile dome tweeters with 90 degrees x 90degrees Tractrix horns deliver crisp highs for sound effects and musical detail. All while, Two 3" polypropylene woofers round out the enhanced sound with crisp vocals and dynamic soundtracks.



Bluetooth

Compatible with most Bluetooth wireless technology enabled devices, including mobile phones, audio devices and computers for wide ranging use.



aptX Audio Coding Technology

Enables lossless, high quality music streaming without elaborate configuration processes. Just pair your device and enjoy.



Dolby Digital Decoder

Allows the soundbar to automatically reproduce detailed, high quality sound no matter what format of sound is coming from the TV's output.
feature_bullets: Wireless 8" Side-Firing Subwoofer, solid MDF Cabinet with a Slot-Port Design for Deep, Powerful Bass
Compatible with most Bluetooth wireless technology enabled devices
